contentList.content: This blade shimmers with elemental force.
Imbue a weapon with elemental power. It receives a +1 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, and deals an additional 1d4 damage of your choice.
Has a +1 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and deals an additional [1].
Imbue a weapon with a corrosive might. It receives a +1 bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, and deals an additional [1].
